summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNARS Afterglow Sensual Shine Lipstick is a color-meets-care hybrid lipstick with dimensional shine and 8-hour hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, non-sticky formula glides on color and shine, giving lips a fuller-looking appearance with buildable, sheer-to-medium coverageColor-meets-care lipstick applies dimensional shine and long-lasting wear while a blend of antioxidants helps protect lipsFeaturesHigh-shine finishSheer-to-medium coverage8-hour hydrationLong-lastingKey IngredientsMONO√è HYDRATING COMPLEX: A moisturizing blend of Coconut Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, and Squalene provides long-lasting comfort for smooth, supple lipsSHEA BUTTER: Forms a nourishing barrier around lips to retain moisture levels for 8-hour hydrationMANGO BUTTER: Helps smooth dry lips with an anti-aging effectItem 2608908How To UseApply to bare lips for a lightweight sheen with lustrous shine.Layer to build from sheer to medium coverage.Top off with Afterglow Lip Shine for an extra high-shine effect.IngredientsTridecyl Trimellitate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Wax, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Mica, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Polyethylene, Diglyceryl Sebacate/Isopalmitate, Dimethicone, Dicalcium Phosphate, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Isopropyl Myristate, Isostearic Acid, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Polysilicone-11, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Water/Aqua/Eau, Collagen, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glycerin. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to bare lips for a lightweight sheen with lustrous shine.Layer to build from sheer to medium coverage.Top off with Afterglow Lip Shine for an extra high-shine effect.
ingredients: Glycerin. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Iron Oxides (Ci 77491

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it!
reviews.comments: I have purchased this product in the past and loved it.  Unfortunately, I'm a little older now (54), and I found that this product bled too much into my lip lines.  I may try a lip liner to prevent it, but older customers beware!  This lipstick bleeds!

reviews.headline: Perfect shade of Wow without the Pow!
reviews.comments: I wasn't intending on buying this at all but there it was, calling my name. Some shades are just too powerful for some people. This one is the WOW without the Pow in a very good way! Go for it. It screams that you know what you're doing even if you don't!

I received a sample size of this as a free gift and loved it so much I wanted to purchase right away. But the PRICE-- and for the amount you get?! Absolutely not. Over my dead body. The MAC mini lipsticks are actually literally half the price... and give you slightly more product. If these make their way into Beauty Steals at some point, I'll happily stock up. But until then? HARD PASS.

reviews.headline: Thanks Han Jisung
reviews.comments: I bought this soley because Han Jisung of Stray Kids was holding/wearing this shade and it doesn't disappoint. Its my perfect YLBB color and it is sheer but not too sheer so you can pair your favorite lipliner and get a glam or muted color. Very versatile and my new go to shade. Again, thank you Hannie üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è

reviews.comments: good

reviews.headline: Good Lipstick
reviews.comments: good

reviews.headline: White Plastic Hairs on Lipstick
reviews.comments:
I got a deluxe sample for my birthday gift from Ulta. It was working fine for about 3 months. But when I used it on Jan. 5th, I felt that there was hair on my lips which I thought was my own. When I took it off my lips, I saw the white really curly plastic hair (it didn't look like natural hair) on my lips. Then I thought I must have gotten it from my siblings jacket, even though his jacket had fur. But when I used it again that day in the night, one swipe and I had a lot of those hairs. I immediately took off the lipstick and was really disappointed that the lipstick that I was wearing for months was not safe to use on the lips. I did break the lipstick about halfway and the bottom was like the top, with no white plastic hairs. However, I did cut up the lipstick too much that I could barely get the leftover on my lips.

I did get an allergic reaction to it, but it was on the skin outside my lips that had a reaction to it not my lips itself. Maybe there was a reason I got that allergy and should have stopped using it, but I really liked how it looked so I would put a cream on and then (when it was dry) put on the lipstick for it to work on me. However, it's sad that who knows how much white curly hairs are on there and that I was using it for long. I know I can't get a refund, but I would have liked to get another one. Anyway, just use this as a warning and hopefully it doesn't happen to you, but just watch out.

reviews.headline: Great lipstick!
reviews.comments: I got a small, sample version of this lipstick and liked it so much I bought the full size version!  I think this is the first time I've done something like that.  I love the color, subtle shine, and it does not dry out my lips.  goes on smooth.

reviews.headline: Breathless color
reviews.comments: Looks nothing like the picture online. Has a orangeness to it when thought it would be very nude. Going to return unfortunately.

reviews.headline: I would not but this product again
reviews.comments: The colors are not true to shade

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: Received as birthday gift and I'm in love. I plan to collect almost every color! These are hydrating and look stunning on! Doesn't last long- true- but the color is gorgeous and it feels like wearing nothing. Amazing!

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: Received as birthday gift and I'm in love. I plan to collect almost every color! These are hydrating and look stunning on! Doesn't last long- true- but the color is gorgeous and it feels like wearing nothing. Amazing!

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I received a mini one as a birthday gift with Ulta , I'm a dark-skinned woman and it is perfect neutral color for me. Beautiful! Full size is expensive, but I will use some of my points to purchase.

reviews.headline: Birthday Gift
reviews.comments:
Pretty color and doesn't feel dry.
But doesn't last very long at all. Absorbs fast. Transfers immediately.
I won't be buying full size. This was birthday gift from Ulta.

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: I got this as a birthday freebie and it does WONDERS. No words other than that!

reviews.headline: LOVE BUY NOWW
reviews.comments: I got this product for free and when I say it's AMAZING I mean it! I got the Lippie in the shade dusty rose and I love it! the mini is soo cute!

reviews.headline: Makes me want to wear lipstick again.
reviews.comments: I haven't worn lipstick in a really long time because they always make my lips very dry and chapped. I received a mini size in Dolce Vita for my birthday reward and it's so hydrating. Feels like a lip balm. The shade is also the perfect pink. Natural and pretty.

reviews.headline: Happy Birthday
reviews.comments: Happy Birthday to me!  I got a mini one from Ulta for my birthday, and its so nice.  I really like the way it feels and the color (Dolce Vita) is pretty.  I'm very light complected, and I don't wear a ton of makeup (for reference), and this is just right.  It's expensive to buy the full size, but i may treat myself.  Its definitely worth trying if youre interested.

reviews.headline: Nov bday mini
reviews.comments: I received the mini as the November birthday gift it feels very moisturizing going on has a hint of color a hint of shine It's just enough for the days that you wanna put something on when you're running errands but not a full face of makeup I would absolutely buy the full size

reviews.headline: universal shade
reviews.comments: This is a wonderful and universal shade! My daughter is fairer than me and this shade works for us both.

media.headline: Color is not what is advertised

faceoff_negative.comments: I was very excited to try this new shine lipstick. Unfortunately, the color is totally different than what is advertised on both colors I ordered, Dolce Vita and Devotion. Devotion is described as a mauve rose and it looks terra cotta when applied, not at all like the picture advertised. Dolce Vita is advertised as a dusty rose and it also looks orange when applied. Only plus is that it does feel moisturizing. Will be returning both.
faceoff_negative.headline: Color is not what is advertised

variant_names: Afterglow Sensual Shine Lipstick - Turned On
